title: Gino D'Acampo to open Manchester prosecco bar serving FREE FOOD every day
text:
Gino D'Acampo to open Manchester prosecco bar serving FREE FOOD every day The celebrity chef is launching My Prosecco Bar at his Italian restaurant inside Manchester's Corn Exchange Share Gino D'Acampo at his restaurant Share Get What's On   Thank you for subscribing!   
Celebrity chef Gino D'Acampo is opening a Manchester prosecco bar, serving more than 40 kinds of fizz and fine wine alongside free nibbles every day. 
The bar will be officially launched inside his Italian eatery, Gino D'Acampo - My Restaurant, at the Corn Exchange next Thursday March 2. 
The wine list will feature 10 types of prosecco, five of which are available by the glass, as well as other sparkling wines such as franciacorta, brachetto d'acqui and champagne. 
More than 30 other red, white and rose wines from all over Italy will also be available by the glass or bottle, along with a selection of Italian craft beers and cocktails, including seasonal bellinis. 
The bar will also host 'aperitivo time' between 4pm and 6.30pm every day, when anyone buying drinks will be able to sample a selection of cicchetti snacks on the house. Gino's Leeds prosecco bar, which launched just before Christmas Read More Where are the best Italian restaurants in Manchester? 
Gino, who is planning to celebrate the opening of the bar in person later in March, said: “When I am back home in Italy I love visiting cool bars for aperitivo, a traditional Italian pre-dinner drink with friends. I love it. 
“At My Prosecco Bar it’s aperitivo time from 4pm until 6.30pm every day so my guests can drink, relax and also enjoy some wonderful cicchetti on me. Salute!” Read More
